positions.title: Tech Recruiter - 6 Months Maternity Cover

You'll work with the Admin, Customer and Technical Teams to source, interview and hire the best talents across Europe and Brazil. You'll be responsible for accomplishing results through the execution and delivery of the end to end, full-cycle recruitment process for a wide range of roles. A significant portion of your efforts will be focused on recruitment marketing and sourcing while determining innovative ways to attract and engage top talent as we continue to grow
responsabilities: Search and headhunt for a wide range of roles using different talent acquisition tools and techniques
Interview and coordinate interviews with hiring managers and founders
Partner and support managers in conversations with hiring managers
Lead and energize the recruitment process, from candidate sourcing through to the offer stage
Delivering great candidate experience throughout the process
Play an active part in building our employer brand across Europe and Brazil
Share market insights and provide new ideas to management and advise on how to attract the best talent
Initiate innovative ideas regarding the hiring process
Attend online hiring events
skills: 3+ years of recruiting experience working for a fast-paced tech startup
Experience integrating and executing marketing plans into recruiting strategy

You have the know-how approach to come up with creative sourcing techniques to attract the right talent and know your way around different sourcing tools like LinkedIn, social media and virtual platforms and job boards
Proven experience in delivering full-cycle / end to end recruiting, you should be confident in slotting into a high performing team
Demonstrated and proven ability to manage and priorities multiple requisitions/roles with an extremely high standard of accuracy and precision
A keen interest in staying in the know in the Tech industry, adopting new recruitment and other recruitment tech tools
Demonstrable experience in Talent Acquisition for a wide range of roles
